Free Code Camp Note

2019-01-31
code_collection
css
  • box-shadow for thumbnail
  • Gradual CSS Linear Gradient
  • Create stripes with repeating-linear-gradient()

box-shadow for thumbnail

#thumbnail{
  box-shadow: 0 10px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.19), 0 6px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.23);
}

Gradual CSS Linear Gradient

<style>
div{
  border-radious:20px;
  width:70%;
  height:400px;
  margin:50px auto;
  background:linear-gradient(35deg,#CCFFFF,#FFCCCC);
}
</style>

<div></div>

Create stripes with repeating-linear-gradient()

  div{ 
    border-radius: 20px;
    width: 70%;
    height: 400px;
    margin:  50 auto;
    background: repeating-linear-gradient(
      45deg,
      yellow 0px,
      yellow 40px,
      black 40px,
      black 80px
    );
  }

</style>

<div></div>
